properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 c1 c2 c3 c4 c5 v1 v2 c1 c2 c3 c4 c5

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
E
(Sisters echo)
You are Holy
You are Mighty
You are Worthy
Worthy of praise

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I will follow
I will listen
I will love You
All of my days

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Brothers:
I will sing to and
worship the king
who is Holy
Sisters:
He's the Lord of lords
He's the King of kings
He's the mighty God
Lord of everything

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
Brothers:
I will love and adore Him
I will bow down before Him
Sisters:
He's Emmanuel
He's the Great I AM
He's my Prince of Peace
Who is the Lamb

verse.name: c3
verse.lines:
Brothers:
I will sing to and
worship the
King who is Holy
Sisters:
He's the Living God
He's the Saving Grace
He will reign forever
He's the Ancient of Days

verse.name: c4
verse.lines:
Brothers:
I will love and adore Him
I will bow down before Him
Sisters:
He's the Alpha Omega
Beginning and End
He's my Savior Messiah
Redeemer and Friend

verse.name: c5
verse.lines:
(together)
He's my Prince of Peace
And I will live my life for Him
He's my Prince of Peace
And I will live my life for Him
